definitions.definition: ( countable ) The larger or thicker end of something; the blunt end, in distinction from the sharp or narrow end

subdefinitions.definition: ( Canada , US , Philippines , slang ) The buttocks or anus ( used as a minced oath in idiomatic expressions; less objectionable than arse / ass ) . ( slang ) The whole buttocks and pelvic region that includes one's private parts . ( slang , metonymic ) Body; self.
examples: Get up off your butt and get to work.
Get your butt to the car.
We can't chat today. I have to get my butt to work before I'm late.

subdefinitions.definition: ( leather trades ) The thickest and stoutest part of tanned oxhides , used for soles of boots, harness, trunks.

definitions.definition: ( countable ) The waste end of anything.

subdefinitions.definition: A piece of land left unplowed at the end of a field.
( US ) A crust end-piece of a loaf of bread .

definitions.definition: ( countable , generally ) An end of something, often distinguished in some way from the other end.

subdefinitions.definition: The end of a firearm opposite to that from which a bullet is fired.
examples: She was hit in the face with the butt of a shotgun.

subdefinitions.definition: ( lacrosse ) The plastic or rubber cap used to cover the open end of a lacrosse stick 's shaft in order to reduce injury.
The portion of a half- coupling fastened to the end of a hose .
The end of a connecting rod or other like piece, to which the boxing is attached by the strap , cotter , and gib .
( mechanical ) A joint where the ends of two objects come squarely together without scarfing or chamfering .

( carpentry ) A kind of hinge used in hanging doors, etc., so named because it is attached to the inside edge of the door and butts against the casing, instead of on its face , like the strap hinge; also called butt hinge .
( shipbuilding ) The joint where two planks in a strake meet.
The blunt back part of an axehead or large blade . Also called the poll .
( dialect or nautical , possibly dated ) The direction from which the wind blows.

definitions.definition: ( countable ) A limit ; a bound ; a goal ; the extreme bound; the end .

subdefinitions.definition: A mark to be shot at; a target .
( usually as "butt of (a) joke" ) A person at whom ridicule , jest , or contempt is directed.
examples: He's usually the butt of their jokes.

subdefinitions.definition: The hut or shelter of the person who attends to the targets in rifle practice.

main_definition: ( countable ) The larger or thicker end of something; the blunt end, in distinction from the sharp or narrow end
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The waste end of anything.
( countable , generally ) An end of something, often distinguished in some way from the other end.
( countable ) A limit ; a bound ; a goal ; the extreme bound; the end .

definitions.definition: A push, thrust, or sudden blow, given by the head; a head butt .
examples: Be careful in the pen, that ram can knock you down with a butt .
The handcuffed suspect gave the officer a desperate butt in the chest.

main_definition: A push, thrust, or sudden blow, given by the head; a head butt .

definitions.definition: ( English units ) An English measure of capacity for liquids, containing 126 wine gallons which is one-half tun .
A wooden cask for storing wine, usually containing 126 gallons.

main_definition: ( English units ) An English measure of capacity for liquids, containing 126 wine gallons which is one-half tun .
secondary_definitions: A wooden cask for storing wine, usually containing 126 gallons.

definitions.definition: ( Northern England ) Any of various flatfish such as sole , plaice or turbot

main_definition: ( Northern England ) Any of various flatfish such as sole , plaice or turbot

definitions.definition: ( dated , West Country and Ireland ) A heavy two-wheeled cart .
( dated , West Country and Ireland ) A three-wheeled cart resembling a wheelbarrow .

main_definition: ( dated , West Country and Ireland ) A heavy two-wheeled cart .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , West Country and Ireland ) A three-wheeled cart resembling a wheelbarrow .

definitions.definition: The shoulder of an animal, especially the portion above the picnic , as a cut of meat .

main_definition: The shoulder of an animal, especially the portion above the picnic , as a cut of meat .
